16  package org.gradoop.temporal.model.impl.operators.matching.single.cypher.testdata.isomorphism;
17  
18  import org.gradoop.temporal.model.impl.operators.matching.TemporalTestData;
19  
20  import java.util.ArrayList;
21  import java.util.Collection;
22  
23  public class IsomorphismOverlapsData implements TemporalTestData {
24    @Override
25    public Collection<String[]> getData() {
26      ArrayList<String[]> data = new ArrayList<>();
27      //overlapping from the "right" side
28  
29      // 1. [(Greenwich St & W Houston) <- (Murray St & West) -> (Shevchenko Pl)]
30      data.add(new String[] {
31        "Overlaps_ISO_1_default_citibike",
32        "MATCH (a)<-[e1]-(b)-[e2]->(c) WHERE b.id=309 " +
33          "AND e1.val.overlaps(e2.val) AND e2.val_from.before(e1.val_from)",
34        "expected1",
35        "expected1[(s26)<-[e16]-(s24)-[e15]->(s25)]"
36      });
37      // overlapping from the "left" side
38  
39      // 1. [ (Shevchenko Pl)<- (Murray St & West) ->(Greenwich St & W Houston) ]
40      data.add(new String[] {
41        "Overlaps_ISO_2_default_citibike",
42        "MATCH (a)<-[e1]-(b)-[e2]->(c) WHERE b.id=309 " +
43          "AND e1.val.overlaps(e2.val) AND e1.val_from.before(e2.val_from)",
44        "expected1",
45        "expected1[(s25)<-[e15]-(s24)-[e16]->(s26)]"
46      });
47  
48      // 1.[(Stanton St & Chrystie St) -[e8]-> (Hancock St & Bedford Ave)
49      //      (E15 St & Irving Pl)-[e3]->(Washington Park)]
50      data.add(new String[] {
51        "Overlaps_ISO_3_default_citibike",
52        "MATCH (a)-[e1]->(b) (c)-[e2]->(d) WHERE e1.edgeId=8 " +
53          "AND NOT e1.val.overlaps(e2.val)",
54        "expected1",
55        "expected1[(s12)-[e8]->(s13) (s3)-[e3]->(s4)]"
56      });
57  
58      return data;
59    }
60  }
